description: A group of digital music file types produced by a variety of software applications called trackers.  Mod files include sequencing information (similar to MIDI_SD) and waveform samples (generally PCM audio), and may be compared to XMF files.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">sound</field><field name="filenameExtension">669, amf, dmf, far, it, med, mod, mt2, mtm, okt, s3m, stm, ult, wow, xm, 669, dmf, far, it, med, mtm, okt, s3m, xm</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Module Music Formats (Mods)

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
